name: HÃ©non map
description_simple: A two-dimensional discrete-time map that, for classical parameter values, exhibits chaotic dynamics with a fractal attractor.
description_complex: A deterministic planar map defined by a quadratic nonlinearity in x and linear coupling to y. At the classical parameter setting (a = 1.4, b = 0.3), it possesses a strange attractor with fractal structure, a positive largest Lyapunov exponent, and strong sensitivity to initial conditions, making it a standard example of chaos in low-dimensional maps.
